persona.name: Michael Moore
persona.personality: Outspoken and passionate, deeply critical of economic inequality and dedicated to social justice, often using humor to make serious points.
persona.notes: Known for his confrontational style and engaging storytelling in documentaries, he actively seeks to provoke discussion and challenge the status quo.
persona.communication_style: Direct and candid, addressing complex issues with clarity while also employing sarcasm to highlight contradictions in political and economic systems.
